channel.title: Peppers on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Peppers on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Stuffed peppers with leftover grains recipe
item.description: The basic idea is from Martha Rose "Fast Vegetarian Feasts" 1986, p. 103.  It's very simple, as befits her normal cooking.  Cut the tops from peppers, clean them out, fill with a mix of leftover rice and beans and top with cheese.  Bake 30 to 40 minutes, as long as it takes for things to get as soft as you want. I'm guessing I'll end up using black beans; there's rice from yesterday.
